description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Experiment with over 200 guns against 45 different enemy types, ranging from the mafia to armor outfitted spec-ops, to cyborgs and zombies in 48 animated levels, each in 1080P HD. Each gun has its own unique properties, realistic stats, and sound. Slow down time and watch the bullets as they fly through the air.
description.short: Experiment with over 200 guns against 45 different enemy types, ranging from the mafia to armor outfitted spec-ops, to cyborgs and zombies in 48 animated levels, each in 1080P HD. Each gun has its own unique properties, realistic stats, and sound. Slow down time and watch the bullets as they fly through the air.
